column2: A place for your men to sleep other than tents
An Improved sleeping quarters for your men,
A line of trenches used to slow down advancing enemy forces.
A headquarters for the commanding officer.
A much better place for managing the fort and its soldiers.
Lines of trenches,bunkers, and pill boxes to bog down any enemy.
Much better than the simple one line trench, these mighty structures will make your foes' advance difficult
A much larger barracks to garrison many more troops.
A anti-air gun used to knock out aircraft.
